query: CreateFrame(graph).as(['graphFrame']); Database("<<ENGINE>>") | Select(<concept>) | Filter( (<concept> == [<instance>]) ) | Import(frame=[graphFrame]); Panel(<SMSS_PANEL_ID>) | SetPanelView("visualization"); TaskOptions({"<SMSS_PANEL_ID>":{"layout": "Graph"}}) | CollectGraph(); Panel ( <SMSS_PANEL_ID> ) | AddPanelOrnaments ( { "tools" : { "shared" : { "displayValues" : true } } } ) ; Panel ( <SMSS_PANEL_ID> ) | RetrievePanelOrnaments ( "tools.shared.displayValues" ) ;
label: Explore an instance
description: Explore instances of a selected concept

model.query: (infinite = Database("<<ENGINE>>") | Select(<concept>) | Filter(<concept> ?like "<search>") | Sort(cols=[<concept>], direction=[asc]) | Iterate()) | Collect(50);
